description:
Ubuntu 25.04 (Plucky Puffin) distribution is now available for download with Linux kernel 6.14, GNOME 48, APT 3.0, and many other changes. Here's what's new!

The post Ubuntu 25.04 “Plucky Puffin” Is Now Available for Download, This Is What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Ubuntu 25.04 “Plucky Puffin” Is Now Available for Download, This Is What’s New

description:
GNOME 48.1 is now available as the first point release to the latest GNOME 48 desktop environment series with improvements and bug fixes.

The post GNOME 48.1 Desktop Is Out to Improve HDR Support and Fix Various Issues appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: GNOME 48.1 Desktop Is Out to Improve HDR Support and Fix Various Issues

description:

title: LXQt 2.2 Desktop Environment Released with Many Wayland Improvements

description:
